title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Where the Wild Things Are
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Dan Kois discuss Where the Wild Things Are.  WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
